div.p: During these challenging time, it is important that as a community we continue to communicate and support each other needs. We are doing our best to keep our families updated and remain committed to providing the high quality learning and support whether our school is closed or not. Our plan to migrate all learning to our online learning platforms is under way….

The Arizona Department of Education released further guidance on which education programs are expected to remain open during the two-week school closure implemented by Gov. Doug Ducey and State Superintendent Kathy Hoffman.

article.class: BlogList-item hentry category-announcement tag-covid-19 author-james-meehan post-type-text article-index-3 featured has-categories has-tags

div.p: As of March 16, 2020, the Arizona Governor’s office has closed all Arizona public schools. As such, Eastpointe High School will be closed until at least March 27th.
